description: This dashboard compares average hourly utilization measurements for physical machines (aka hosts) day-over-day for the two consecutive days. All physical machines in the selected group are included in the averages.

panels.description: Average Memory utilization for physical machines

targets.rawSql:
WITH data as (
   SELECT m.time
          ,m.utilization AS avg_util
      FROM entity e
      JOIN metric m ON m.entity_oid = e.oid
       AND m.entity_hash = e.hash
       AND m.type = 'MEM'
       AND e.type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE'
       AND m.time BETWEEN ($__timeFrom()::TIMESTAMPTZ - interval '24 HOUR') AND date_trunc('HOUR', $__timeTo()::TIMESTAMPTZ)
       AND ($__timeFrom()::TIMESTAMPTZ - interval '24 HOUR', $__timeTo()::TIMESTAMPTZ) OVERLAPS (first_seen, last_seen)
       AND CASE WHEN ARRAY[ $Group ] = ARRAY[ '0' ] THEN true ELSE (e.scope && ARRAY[ $Group ]::bigint[]) END
)

SELECT CASE 
            WHEN time BETWEEN date_trunc('hour', $__timeFrom()::TIMESTAMPTZ - interval '24 HOUR') AND date_trunc('hour', $__timeTo()::TIMESTAMPTZ - interval '24 HOUR') THEN date_trunc('HOUR', time + interval '24 HOUR') 
            ELSE date_trunc('HOUR', time) 
       END + INTERVAL '1 HOUR' as "time"
      ,CASE 
            WHEN time BETWEEN $__timeFrom()::TIMESTAMPTZ - interval '24 HOUR' AND $__timeTo()::TIMESTAMPTZ - interval '24 HOUR' THEN 'Previous Day'
            ELSE 'Ending ' || DATE($__timeTo()::TIMESTAMPTZ)::TEXT
       END as metric
      ,avg(avg_util)
  FROM data
 GROUP BY 1, 2
 ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Physical Machine Avg Memory Utilization - Day over Day by Hour

panels.title: Physical Machine Avg Net Throughput Utilization - Day over Day by Hour

list.definition:
SELECT name as __text,
       oid as __value 
FROM entity 
WHERE entity.type = 'GROUP' 
AND ($__timeFrom(),$__timeTo()) OVERLAPS (first_seen, last_seen) 
AND attrs -> 'member_types' ? 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE'
GROUP BY name, oid 
ORDER BY 1
list.name: Group
list.query:
SELECT name as __text,
       oid as __value 
FROM entity 
WHERE entity.type = 'GROUP' 
AND ($__timeFrom(),$__timeTo()) OVERLAPS (first_seen, last_seen) 
AND attrs -> 'member_types' ? 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE'
GROUP BY name, oid 
ORDER BY 1

title: Physical Machine Utilization Day over Day by Hour
